name: Allen Frise
summary: Results-driven full stack software developer with over 10 years of experience specializing in geospatial systems, financial technology, and enterprise software solutions. Proven track record of delivering high-impact solutions in remote and office environments, with expertise in C#/.NET, Java, and modern web technologies. Demonstrated ability to lead technical initiatives while maintaining a focus on code quality and user experience.

Command line scripting in Linux and Windows
Communicating with clients and coworkers to ensure effective delivery of product
